title: Epistrophy
content:
I wanted to get some feedback from everyone before I move on to different weights/finalizing in FontLab. This is an odd sans serif I am working on. This is obviously more of a display face, not sure how legible it would be at small sizes. I look forward to your thoughts.  
Thanks

author: jonbruns

comments.content: Nice. I like the name, too. I would mirror the o's; it looks kind of like it might say "epistr **a** phy," and the captial O could potentially read as a D or Q.
Thanks for the thoughts. It is named after a Thelonious Monk song. I was a little torn when I was creating the "O"s I was trying to make them a bit different. Maybe I went too far. Thanks again!
